features.featureTitle: Add a 'Schedule a Demo' booking form section to the page. The form should collect the visitor's full name, work email address, company name, team size (dropdown: 1–10, 11–50, 51–200, 200+), and a preferred contact time (text or dropdown). Include a 'Book My Demo' submit button. On successful submission, display an inline confirmation message such as 'Thanks! A member of our team will reach out shortly to confirm your demo.' The form should be accessible via the 'Schedule a Demo' button in the CTA section (smooth scroll) and linked from the navbar.
Add a React Query mutation hook `useSubmitDemoRequest` in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` that calls the backend `submitDemoRequest` method, mirroring the existing `useCaptureEmail` pattern.
